column1: COST BREAKDOWN PER TIER (Reference from Assumptions)
Note: Payment processing (2.5% of revenue) included in variable COGS calculation
Customer counts from Customer Mix sheet
Variable COGS = Customers × COGS per tier (simplified to $2.5 $5 $11.5 $30.5 including payment processing average)
Fixed costs change by year (Year 1: months 1-12 Year 2: months 13-24 Year 3: months 25-36)
Total Costs = Variable COGS + Fixed OpEx
